name: CountryMania
description:
Country Mania is nice Puzzle Game with many Countries Flaps

Country Mania:
Quiz to learn country capitals, currencies and flags, this is of match the following type you have to choose the correct answer for that you will get 5 points for each and for wrong answer -2 points for each and timer also available, you can know in how much time you completed one session.
--> Match the following type Quiz.

--> You can learn about country Capitals, Currency and Flags.

--> Friendly interface and feel good application.

--> Give your valuable feedback
